title: "Classic Grill" connected neon-like script
content:
pls tell if anyone know this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011010055im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/15764-Classic%20Grill_6086.jpg)

 [‹ ID: Taxi Driver title font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011010055/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45109 "Go to previous forum topic") [bride's magazine ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011010055/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45112 "Go to next forum topic")
author: artslons

comments.content: That’s not very well designed (I’m being kind here), so guess this is either custom designed or a freeware/shareware font.

You might like [Streamline](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011010055/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/script/Streamline) or [Raceway](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011010055/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/script/Raceway) both from Font Bureau.
